website_summaries.verdict: A warm, well-constructed boot style with cute button accents.
pros: Loved by users for its adorable, button-accented look, this child's boot style stands out for being warm and stylish
Some reported that the design and quality were nicer than expected
cons: Occasionally, users had issues with the buttons becoming loose or falling off
Need to be waterproofed if worn in rain or snow

customer_reviews.title: ... were high quality boots that my daughter wanted so bad. I bought a bigger size after reading reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots were high quality boots that my daughter wanted so bad. I bought a bigger size after reading reviews and my daughter walked out of them. She is a size 2. I bought Size 3 after the reviews. A 2 would have fit perfect. Great boot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: michael a osullivan

customer_reviews.title: Iffy quality on the Inside, TERRIBLE construction quality on the buttons
customer_reviews.text: The boots themselves seemed very nice when they came out of the box, but the lining started coming out in tufts within the first day. Many boots we've had with this type of lining experience the same thing to a degree, but this was excessive. To add insult to injury, two of the buttons fell off within the first few days and the others are literally hanging by a single thread. If you buy these boots, I strongly suggest reinforcing the buttons before the boots are worn.
customer_reviews.author: lara

customer_reviews.title: Will likely fall apart
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. Our pair fell apart starting in a matter of weeks. The buttons fell off...no big deal, but they are critical to the structure of the boots so are now unwearable. They lasted half of one season. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots, they last much better than Uggs. I keep rebuying them for my girls , ages 9 & 5, they like them. Good quality and the price is right. Very warm and comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Boot
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little big on my daughter but she wore the heck out of them this entire winter. She has a hard time with shoes so finding one that she can wear and that is comfortable is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: gidge66

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them. You just can go wrong with the quality that Bearpaw has.
customer_reviews.author: Gem City

customer_reviews.title: nice quality and construction
customer_reviews.text: Cute, nice quality and construction. However, daughter was size 1.5 wide and got 2 for some extra width and she couldn't get her foot in the boot because the top part of the shoe is very tight and narrow. We had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Azulza

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: True to shoe size but the top of the boot is just way to wide. Doesn’t look flattering
customer_reviews.author: Jovica Micic

customer_reviews.title: Kids winter boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these bear paw boots. They are well made and so comfy, also the hold up really well, her last pair still look great, she just out grew them. Definitely a quality product
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN S.

customer_reviews.title: she said they are very comfortable and not heavy
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old Loves Them , she said they are very comfortable and not heavy, I did go up a size and glad i did because i would like her to have them for awhile my daughter wears a 12 and i ordered a 13.Perfect just wish they would be water proof .
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice..
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, these boots fell apart in two days. The buttons on the side all fell off. Very disappointed. I’m looking for the box now to try and return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ksc

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up well
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these for a little over a month my daughter came home from school said she tripped and fell and the sole of her shoe had come apart. I had hoped for the price of these boots that they would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and great shoes, my daughter loves them! It's 80 degrees and she insists on wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Bella V.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes them, but I've had 3 of the buttons fall off. Fortunately she has found them each time (a minor miracle). I think I'm going to redo them all. Not sure how long they will last, though.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute boots and my daughter loves them. However, she just got them for xmas and with just normal wear, 2 buttons became unstitched (causing us to loose one) on one of the boots. When I contacted the company they didn't seem to care...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Torn apart in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the boot, however she has had it for 1 month and it fell apart. So disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Orli Kotkin

customer_reviews.title: Great! We love Ugg’s but decided to go with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! We love Ugg’s but decided to go with these and super glad we did!
customer_reviews.author: CadyV

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but the button ripped off after only two usages. We we returned
customer_reviews.author: Hvgolds

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. They are comfy and warm but haven't seen ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They are comfy and warm but haven't seen snow yet, so we'll see. They're not quite as cushy on the bottom as uggs are though.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Save your money- these fall apart!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are cute, but started to fall apart within the first week. We now have one button left on one boot after just 3 weeks. I would never recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mommalovesvodka

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, hasn’t been cold enough to wear yet
customer_reviews.text: Size was as expected. My granddaughter loves them. So far so good, hasn’t been cold enough to wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: They are really cute, but the foot inserts are thin, I can feel the bottom of the boot after wearing them for a bit. For the price, I would not hesitate to purchase them again though.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so nice for my little girl feats perfect good quality I love them
customer_reviews.author: Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Hate the buttons
customer_reviews.text: The buttons fell off in a week... Other then that I loved them and so did my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Dellie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter for her birthday. She Loves them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Love

customer_reviews.title: Says their very comfortable and keeps her feet very warm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Says their very comfortable and keeps her feet very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots. Nice fit and very comfortable. We put guard starch on them to protect from the rain and she had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a birthday present for my daughter but the buttons fell off within a few days. Not worth the money or aggravation!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my granddaughter. Had to give to ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my granddaughter. Had to give to someone else and do in-store shopping to get right size for her growing feet. The boots work well for the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: Babbsy L. Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Not completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: They were a little more snug then other pairs my daughter has. Also the right boot on the inside of the toe area was not together right :( but my daughter already wore them and told me to late or I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! Bought them for my 6 year old daughter and she is in love with them!!
customer_reviews.author: bianca brazier

customer_reviews.title: A womans would be better, but would be good for the girls
customer_reviews.text: These were ok, sold them to a friend who wanted them. A womans would be better, but would be good for the girls :)
customer_reviews.author: Janel Kapsy

customer_reviews.title: Then we purchased these which seem to hold up a lot better and are much better quality
customer_reviews.text: We initially ordered Osh Kosh boots that totally fell apart in 1 month. Then we purchased these which seem to hold up a lot better and are much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Super Warm!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. The only negative comention have is I got them 2 days later than guaranteed prI me delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: boot is super cute but first wear and button fell off
customer_reviews.text: boot is super cute but first wear and button fell off. Read reviews that it was an issue but tried anyway-sorry we did
customer_reviews.author: Tina Moroney

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my daughter.. She wore them twice and lost a button. Very poor quality.. Wondering if they are even authentic Bear Paw..
customer_reviews.author: penny bonfiglio

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots but not durable. My daughter has had ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots but not durable. My daughter has had them for a week and two of the buttons fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were a gift for my granddaughter and she loved them and will wear them even if they are ...
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift for my granddaughter and she loved them and will wear them even if they are a little big. She will grow into them!
customer_reviews.author: CANDY A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother in law who has very small feet, she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Tiffini Shinsel

customer_reviews.title: These are ridiculous!!! All of the buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ridiculous!!! All of the buttons have fell off. Not once, not twice but 3 times. She hasn't even had them a month
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had these before I loved then, I just ordered a size too small
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: They were for a Granddaughter of mine and she decided she didn't like the feeling of fur on her foot bottom
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and fit well. They were for a Granddaughter of mine and she decided she didn't like the feeling of fur on her foot bottom. We will keep them for her younger sister.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Thompson
